content.title: Qui suis je ?
content.text:
Self-taught, creative and curious by nature, I have recently become interested in web 3.0 and blockchain technologies, including the development of smart contracts on the Solana blockchain.

For this fourth year of work-study at CESI, and with the aim of validating my Master Manager in Architecture Applications of Information Systems (Bac +5 level), I joined the Wokine company development team as a PHP back-end developer.
